posts.title: Pig Shaped Wood Fired Grill
posts.content: Cook your juicy slabs of meat to perfection inside this pig shaped wood fired grill. Styled like a plump piggy, this wood burning steel grill’s ample cylindrical body can easily fit up to 16 burgers, 4 chickens, 24 hot dogs, and 5 mouthwatering rib racks.

posts.title: Spin The Shot Drinking Game
posts.content: Mercilessly destroy your liver with this thrilling drinking game of spin the shot glass. Combining the elements of statistics and alcoholism, this fun drinking game is perfect for a few friends to gather around and see who can survive after a few hours of reckless drinking.

posts.title: Crime Scene Spray
posts.content: See what unspeakable atrocities have been committed by using this crime scene spray. Luminol is a highly sensitive blood reagent that detects latent bloodstain evidence that usually relates to the clean up after a bloodletting event has occurred.

posts.title: Watermelon Tap Kit
posts.content: Convert any hollowed out fruit or veggie into a vibrant, all natural keg with this watermelon tap kit. The tap screws directly into a watermelon and spews out the delicious contents through a chrome-finished spout you control with a brass handle.

posts.title: Barbecue Grill Cleaning Robot
posts.content: Keep the grill looking like new by unleashing the barbecue grill cleaning robot after every use. This pint size little robot boasts three powerful electric motors in addition to smart computer technology to ensure the entire surface gets evenly cleaned.

posts.title: Wrap Around Neck Travel Pillow
posts.content: Keep your head from bobbing around while you try to catch some Z’s by cozying up with this wrap around neck travel pillow. The ergonomic wrap around design comfortably holds your neck upright while providing better support than traditional travel pillows.

posts.title: Personal Craft Beer Brewing Machine
posts.content: The Pico C personal craft beer brewing machine is the solution for anyone who’s ever wanted to brew but didn’t know how. This app assisted appliance simplifies the entire process so that you can brew a fresh 5L batch with the push of a button.

posts.title: Hangout Nest
posts.content: Kick back and relax in total comfort the next time you venture into the wild by bringing along the hanging nest. This portable cocoon hangs from branches and creates a cozy protective environment ideal for resting inside of while enjoying the view of Mother Nature.

posts.title: Spiral Egg Rack
posts.content: Keep those farm fresh eggs on display and at hand with the spiral egg rack. The captivating design accommodates up to 20 medium to large sized eggs and allows you to stack them in order of freshness so you’re guaranteed a tasty meal.

posts.title: Remote Control Tarantula Spider
posts.content: Freak out friends and family by infesting their homes with the remote control tarantula spider. This radioactive sized tarantula  measures a whopping six inches long and features “awesome-crawling-action” so you can unleash terror in any household.

posts.title: Star Wars BB-9E App-Enabled Droid
posts.content: If your loyalties lie with the Dark Side of the force, this Star Wars BB-9E is the droid you’ve been looking for. This little app-enabled droid features realistic movement, holographic simulation that lets you explore the Star Wars galaxy, and it can interact with your BB-8 droid.

posts.title: Wobble Chess Set
posts.content: Bring the fun out of your serious strategy games partners with the wobble chess set. At first it may seem like another fancy chess board with shiny pieces, but once the wiggle and wobbling starts, it’ll even have your non-chess playing friends wanting to join in.
